price: 49. Mas si ellos tienen la razón, acuden al Mensajero de Al-lah raudos y obedientes (para que dictamine en su favor).
arabic: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ يَأۡتُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مُذۡعِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yakun lahumu al-ḥaqu yatū ilayhi mudh'ʿinīna
